Class CoursesTab

java.lang.Object
com.panotify.ui.student.CoursesTab
All Implemented Interfaces:
StudentTab
public class CoursesTab extends Object implements StudentTab
Tab for displaying and managing student course enrollments Provides interface for viewing enrolled courses, course details, and enrolling in new courses
